In this paragraph, the two "Property Value" entities are:

1. "π-π stacking distance (dπ)": This is a property used to describe the distance between two parallel aromatic systems in a molecule.
2. "3.7 Å": This is the value of the π-π stacking distance that was observed, measured in Angstroms (Å).
